description:
Long trail days call for trail shoes that back up your ambitions. Mesh lining and fatigue-fighting cushioning blunt the rocks and nobbly roots along your route, giving you more energy to push to summits and viewpoints. M Select DRY waterproof-breathable membrane keeps your feet dry on wet and muddy trails.

  • Breathable mesh upper is lightweight with TPU overlays to add durability in high-wear areas
  • Waterproof M Select™ DRY seals out water and lets moisture escape
  • Kinetic Fit TRI contoured footbed provides light support
  • EVA midsole cushions and comforts underfoot
  • Nylon arch shank provides stability on tough terrain
  • Vibram TC5+ outsole with 3.5mm lugs provides durable traction
name: Merrell Siren Edge 3 Waterproof Light Trail Shoes - Women's
